Entries.default: "Do you seek companionship on your travels across the Deadfire? Why not take a little friend along?"
"Remember, a pet is a great responsibility."
"Pets can be a comfort in... trying times."
"These creatures deserve a home far from here."
"We have many animals on offer, all well-trained and eager for a new home."
"Ekera, you are sure to find one that suits you!"
